strapiPost.title: Benton County Releases Interactive Map To Better Communicate Road Closures
strapiPost.content:
A new interactive road closure map revealing real-time road closures from construction or severe weather has been developed by Benton County Informational Technology Department alongside the Road Department.

  • Be prepared: The map will be updated in real-time with flooded or damaged roads labeled “impassable roads,” making it a valuable tool during severe weather events. Users can click on a closure to view more details, including pictures of damage or flooding.
  • County roads: The map will only feature unincorporated roads maintained by the county, not city streets, and can be viewed year-round on the Benton County Road Dept. homepage via computer or mobile.
